es.already_paired: This device has already been paired.
es.autostart_after_message: Automatically start the bridge service, in seconds.
es.certification_benefits: Another benefit to using certified plugins is, HOOBS support. Since HOOBS tests certified plugins, we are familiar with the plugin and can help troubleshoot issues. And in the event where the plugins is broke, we can work with the plugin developer on your behalf to help address the issue.
es.certification_program: The HOOBS certification program helps promote plugins that work. We work with the plugin developer to address issues, and help keep the plugins simple and easy to configure.
es.config_reboot_confirm: You need to reboot for these changes to take effect.
es.confirm_action: Are you sure you want to continue?
es.confirm_exit: Are you sure you want to leave?
es.confirm_factory_reset: Are you sure you want to reset this device?
es.confirm_reboot: Are you sure you want to reboot this device?
es.confirm_refresh: Are you sure you want to refresh?
es.confirm_remove: Are you sure you want to remove this device?
es.confirm_restart: Are you sure you want to restart the bridge?
es.country_code_message: Establecer el código de país de donde es este dispositivo. Esto se utiliza para las previsiones meteorológicas
es.device_address: Enter the IP address your HOOBS device
es.device_hostname: Assign a name for this device
es.end_port_invalid: Puerto final invalido. Debería ser un numero entre 1 y 65535.
es.factory_reset_message: This will remove all plugins, configurations and settings.
es.help_welcome: HOOBS is an ecosystem that aims to unify and simplfy the "Smart Home". We beilive that you should be able to use the devices you want, and not be locked into one provider's solution. If you want to use Google Home for your voice control and Apple Home for your routines, go ahead, HOOBS will make tht happen for you. HOOBS can connect your devices togeather by the use of plugins. HOOBS has "Certified Plugins", and it supports Homebridge plugins. This means you have over 1,000 choices when it comes to your Smart Home tech.
es.home_pin_message: El PIN usado cuando agregas Homebridge a Apple Casa.
es.home_username_message: El nombre de usuario que usa Apple Casa para identificar a Homebridge.
es.homekit_disconnect: Esto desconectará Homebridge de Apple Inicio. Tendrá que volver a emparejar.
es.hoobs_unavailable: HOOBS is not available on this device.
es.invalid_mac_address: This device doesn't have a valid MAC address.
es.invalid_port_range: Rango de puertos invalido. El puerto final debe ser mayor que el puerto inicial.
es.language_message: Configura el idioma de la interfaz o use “auto” para usar el idioma del navegador.
es.latitude_message: Set the latitude to where this device is. This is used for weather forecasts
es.longitude_message: Set the longitude to where this device is. This is used for weather forecasts
es.name: Nombre
es.plugin_select_device: Select a device to install this plugin.
es.polling_seconds_invalid: Refresh interval is invalid. It must be an integer between 1 second and 30 minutes.
es.polling_seconds_message: Refresh the accessory states interval in seconds.
es.postal_code_message: Ponga el código postal de donde este dispositivo es. Esto se utiliza para las previsiones meteorológicas
es.range_name_message: Descripción del rango de puertos usado para identificarlo.
es.save_validation: Por favor, arregla los siguientes errores.

es.service_name_message: Usado para identificar el servicio de Hombridge en el sistema.
es.service_name_required: El nombre del servicio es requerido.
